mutants.code:
import string
import re

def flip_string(s):
    s = re.sub('[' + string.punctuation - ']', '', s)
    s = s[::-1]
    return s

import string
import re

def flip_string(s):
    s = re.sub(('[' + string.punctuation) * ']', '', s)
    s = s[::-1]
    return s

import string
import re

def flip_string(s):
    s = re.sub('[' + string.punctuation + ']', 'MUTATED', s)
    s = s[::-1]
    return s

import re

    s = s[::-1]
    return s

import string
import re

def flip_string(s):
    s = re.sub('[' + string.punctuation + ']', '', s)
    s = s[::--1]
    return s
